    Interface for dependency injection containers.

    package Aura.Di

     Methods

    Gets a service object by key, lazy-loading it as needed.

    get(string $key) : object

    Parameters

    $key

    string

    The service to get.

    Exceptions

    \Aura\Di\Exception\ServiceNotFound when the requested service does not exist.

    Returns

    object

    Returns a Lazy that gets a service.

    lazyGet(string $key) : \Aura\Di\Lazy

    Parameters

    $key

    string

    The service name; it does not need to exist yet.

    Returns

    \Aura\Di\LazyA lazy-load object that gets the named service.

    Returns a Lazy that creates a new instance.

    lazyNew(string $class, array $params, array $setters) : \Aura\Di\Lazy

    Parameters

    $class

    string

    The type of class of instantiate.

    $params

    array

    Override parameters for the instance.

    $setters

    array

    Override setters for the instance.

    Returns

    \Aura\Di\LazyA lazy-load object that creates the new instance.

    Lock the Container so that configuration cannot be accessed externally, and no new service definitions can be added.

    Returns a new instance of the specified class, optionally with additional override parameters.
